com.objetdirect.tatami.client.data
Class Request

java.lang.Object
  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.data.Request
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConvertibleToJSObject
public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConvertibleToJSObject

This object wraps a query object sent by dojo to perform a fetch in the store. It can be used to perform a fetch in the store. It contains various information, such as the sort fields , the filtering options, number of items to return ...

Author:
rdunklau

Returns:

setStartItemNumber

public void setStartItemNumber(int startItemNumber)
Parameters:
startItemNumber - : the maximum number of item to return. For example, if startItemNumber = 10 , the fetch process invoked with this request should return only item from position 10 in the sorted list.

Adds a sort parameter

Parameters:
sortField - : the field name on which the items should be fetched
ascending - : whether it is sorted in ascending or descending order

public java.util.List<SortField> getSortFields()
Returns:
